movie.title: Red Notice
movie.description: In the world of international crime, an Interpol agent attempts to hunt down and capture the world's most wanted art thief.

movie.title: Uncharted
movie.description: Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him find the lost fortune of Ferdinand Magellan. However, they face competition from Santiago Moncada, who believes that the treasure belongs to him.

movie.title: New Gods: Nezha Rborn
movie.description: While living as an ordinary deliveryman and motor racing fan, Nezha encounters old nemeses and must rediscover his powers as a Chinese deity to protect his loved ones

movie.title: Imagine That
movie.description: Evan Danielson, a successful financial advisor, faces turmoil due to lack of confidence. However, he finds a solution to all his problems in the imaginary world weaved by his daughter.

movie.title: Spenser Confidential
movie.description: To unravel a twisted murder conspiracy, a former police detective returns to Boston's criminal underworld.

movie.title: Black And Blue
movie.description: Witnessing her colleagues killing a drug dealer lands police officer Alicia West into trouble. Falsely accused of the crime, she now has to fight both the corrupt police and evil gangsters.
